    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    createEdgeWT()
    By copying GENERAL_WT_DATA create GENERAL_WT_NAME tiling data
    static void
    createFilecatsTable(BioCondition bioCond, String fileName, boolean normalization)
    Create filecats = list of data in a table, used by the R script to run Tiling normalization
    static void
    norm(Experiment exp)
    Normalize the Tiling contained in the Experiment
    Run one thread for each bioCondition
    The number of thread is limited by the number of processor

    It runs DNA reference normalization (Hubert et al.), it can uses also an additional reference data for normalization (indicates by boolean normalization).
    static void
    qualityControlNorm(Experiment exp)
    Check temp folder, and GeneExprComplete folder to see if some GeneExpression are not present in GeneExprComplete

  • Constructor Details

    • GRNormalization

      public GRNormalization()

  • Method Details

    • norm

      public static void norm(Experiment exp)
      Normalize the Tiling contained in the Experiment
      Run one thread for each bioCondition
      The number of thread is limited by the number of processor

      It runs DNA reference normalization (Hubert et al.), it can uses also an additional reference data for normalization (indicates by boolean normalization).
      Parameters:
      exp - list of all BioCondition to check

    • createFilecatsTable

      public static void createFilecatsTable(BioCondition bioCond, String fileName, boolean normalization)
      Create filecats = list of data in a table, used by the R script to run Tiling normalization
      Parameters:
      bioCond - to normalized
      fileName - name of the filecats file
      normalization - indicates if we use a reference data for normalization or not

    • createEdgeWT

      public static void createEdgeWT()
      By copying GENERAL_WT_DATA create GENERAL_WT_NAME tiling data

    • qualityControlNorm

      public static void qualityControlNorm(Experiment exp)
      Check temp folder, and GeneExprComplete folder to see if some GeneExpression are not present in GeneExprComplete
      Parameters:
      exp - list of all BioCondition to check
